Planning

## Contact

### Code Enforcement Counter

505-924-3860  
Plaza Del Sol, 4th Floor, Ste 500  
[See Plaza Del Sol on a map](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Plaza+Del+Sol+Bldg/@35.0891593,-106.6479485,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x1b241fe79cb5907c?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjQrYb9yNH8AhXkHkQIHRCfDFAQ_BJ6BAhcEAg)  
8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday to Friday

### Zoning Permit Counter

505-924-3857  
Plaza Del Sol, 1st Floor  
8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday to Friday, closed Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.

## What We Do

Code Enforcement provides a positive constituent experience by being responsive to the community’s land use concerns through timely and thorough interaction to achieve compliance.

admission_text:
ABQ BioPark

## Hours

  * **Zoo****:** 9 am to 5 pm
  * **Aquarium:** 9 am to 5 pm 
    * closes at 4 pm during River of Lights
  * **Botanic Garden:** 9 am to 5 pm 
    * closes at 4 pm during River of Lights
  * **Last entry to each park 1/2 hour before closing.**
  * **Tingley Beach:** Daily from sunrise to sunset.
  * **Winter hours: Closed Mondays between Veteran's Day and Presidents day**
  * **Closed Jan. 1, Thanksgiving, and Dec. 25.**

## Tickets

Parks frequently sell out. To guarantee access, purchase tickets before your visit! Tickets are available up to two weeks in advance. 

[](https://artsandculture.cabq.gov/events?k=biopark)

**The City of Albuquerque is the sole provider of tickets for events at City venues. We do not support resale ticket sites or accept tickets issued by third parties.**

[Save with a membership.](https://www.bioparksociety.org/main/memberships/)

## Maps

  * [Zoo Map](https://www.cabq.gov/artsculture/biopark/documents/zoo-visitors-map-august-2025-draft.pdf)
  * [Aquarium Map](https://www.cabq.gov/artsculture/biopark/documents/aquariumvisitorsmapseptember2025draftv5a.pdf)
  * [Botanic Garden Map](https://www.cabq.gov/artsculture/biopark/documents/botanic-garden-visitors-map-august-2025-draft.pdf)
  * [Tingley Map](https://www.cabq.gov/artsculture/biopark/documents/tingley-map.pdf)

## Welcome to the ABQ BioPark

About Your City Website

_Updated Dec. 18, 2023_

The City of Albuquerque website is managed by the Department of Technology & Innovation with the cooperation of all City departments. Website policies are determined by the Information Systems Committee. City departments maintain their perspective website content and appropriate contacts are listed on all City web pages for more information on a particular topic. For further questions, please contact: [[email protected].](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#4b3c2e29262a383f2e390b282a293a652c243d)

The City of Albuquerque, New Mexico.

All rights reserved. If you are the owner of intellectual property used on this site and you believe that it is being used without your permission, please see [Digital Millennium Copyright Act Information.](https://www.cabq.gov/about/dmca)

collections_text:
Albuquerque Museum

# Art. History. People.

HOURS: Tuesdays–Sundays, 9 a.m.–5 p.m. [See prices and admission information](/artsculture/albuquerque-museum/albuquerque-museum/resolveuid/0a5fec421af64049b633a3ed158d3793). You may purchase tickets to Albuquerque Museum [online](https://artsandculture.cabq.gov/events?k=abq%20museum).

**Albuquerque Museum ● 2000 Mountain Road NW, Albuquerque, NM 87104 ● 505-243-7255**

Do you have a work of art that you would like to donate or sell to the Museum? Please see our collections guidelines and fill out the offer form for consideration.

[Image Use Request Form](/artsculture/albuquerque-museum/albuquerque-museum/resolveuid/528d317bd905412a9af5484cca6a8b90 "Albuquerque Museum Image Use Request Form") [Collections Guidelines & Offer Form](/artsculture/albuquerque-museum/albuquerque-museum/resolveuid/aadfd54228c54cb48a513cda1f89d41c) [Sign Up: Albuquerque Museum News](https://visitor.r20.constantcontact.com/manage/optin?v=001m92UI6t_PSNztauOU9M0IdOLTMcHSquyk34pP_kf8BJKch_96aErz4XAygNB2_h9K6SGBqJioqf6tE-0bSl65D3zUldjrXqThv05LmlpMX6s7cywnY0U5TWWQaqEmLKXxjvcxH9osHPaWsDz26EX5R2D7HAaOK6_2JovR_0CWyY%3D)
